title: Court Order
marks:
Signature, date, title, number, chop mark LL: [Progressive Proof - 2 of 5]
Lower center: [\"
description: Abstract depiction of a court room with angular, simplified objects; on R, an outline of a large podium with standing (or seated) figure; on L, three long rows with several figures; front row is pale green, second and third row is pale orange; section of American flag on R border
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
